data.description: Apple Push Notification Service with OpenSSL
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I develop this module with Net::SSLeay for openssl, so I choose
    Net::APNS. This module best point is using openssl. Apple Push
    Notification Service can make other programming languages,and sure
    perl :) But so cheep to configuration set. This module has so rich
    interface by openssl.

    I working about iPhone develop between app-side and server-side. I
    have ï»¿ï»¿confidence to use this module for any project.
